name: Guard Squad
description: The Guard Squad is a large humanoid creature that acts as a protective unit in combat. It can absorb damage and has the ability to transform when severely injured.
memorable: Its ability to transform into multiple guards when defeated keeps the encounter dynamic and engages players even after it seems defeated.
goals: To act as a protective force on the battlefield and engage intruders.
relations: Could be allied with other humanoids or soldiers.
strengths: Functions as a strong defensive entity and retains influence even when reduced to 0 hit points.
weaknesses: Takes double damage from area attacks, making it particularly vulnerable to such strategies.
attacks: Utilizes spears for melee and ranged attacks, dealing significant piercing damage.
most_powerful_ability: Squad Dispersal allows it to spawn additional guards upon defeat, extending its influence.
equipment: Spears for both melee and ranged combat.
senses: Has a passive perception of 12, giving it a slightly above-average ability to notice its surroundings.
skills: Skilled in perception, helping it to detect threats in its environment.
additional_information: Composed of 5 or more individual guards.
Can move through spaces suitable for Medium creatures.
Ignores non-damaging effects when targeted as a squad.
Deals half damage with spear attacks when bloodied.
test_queries: guard squad that transforms when injured
squad that takes double damage from area attacks
humanoid that splits into multiple guards
durable creature with spear and strategic weaknesses
